roleset.name: cause to become darker in skin tone

role.descr: tanned entity, entity courting skin cancer
description of tan, attribute of arg 1

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to tan.01. Tan.01 is a member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie.

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: He witnessed the daily craft-making of his mother and grandmother, their sewing of moccasins, their tanning of hides.
